# NSBezierPath.WindingRule

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the winding rule a Bézier path uses.

## Declaration

```swift
enum WindingRule
```

## Overview

These constants are described in more detail in [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/CocoaDrawingGuide/Paths/Paths.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40003290-CH206].

## Constants

- **NSBezierPath.WindingRule.nonZero**: Specifies the non-zero winding rule.
- **NSBezierPath.WindingRule.evenOdd**: Specifies the even-odd winding rule.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Constants

- **NSBezierPath.ElementType**: Constants that specify basic path element commands.
- **NSBezierPath.LineJoinStyle**: Constants that specify the shape of the joins between connected segments of a stroked path.
- **NSBezierPath.LineCapStyle**: Constants that specify the shape of endpoints for an open path when it is stroked.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
